member.name: Windows.FAILED
member.summary: Provides a generic test for failure on any status value.
member.param: The status code. This value can be an HRESULT or an SCODE. A negative number indicates failure.

member.name: Windows.HRESULT_CODE
member.summary: Extracts the code portion of the specified HRESULT.

member.name: Windows.HRESULT_FACILITY
member.summary: Extracts the facility of the specified HRESULT, which indicates what API or framework originated this error.

member.name: Windows.HRESULT_FROM_NT
member.summary: Maps an NT status value to an HRESULT value.

member.name: Windows.HRESULT_FROM_WIN32
member.summary: Maps a system error code to an HRESULT value.

member.name: Windows.HRESULT_SEVERITY
member.summary: Extracts the severity field of the specified HRESULT.

member.name: Windows.IS_ERROR
member.summary: Provides a generic test for errors on any status value.
member.param: The status code. This value can be an HRESULT or an SCODE.

member.name: Windows.MAKE_HRESULT
member.summary: Creates an HRESULT value from its component pieces.

member.name: Windows.MAKE_SCODE
member.summary: Creates an SCODE value from its component pieces.

member.name: Windows.SCODE_CODE
member.summary: Extracts the code portion of the specified SCODE.

member.name: Windows.SCODE_FACILITY
member.summary: Extracts the facility of the specified SCODE.

member.name: Windows.SCODE_SEVERITY
member.summary: Extracts the severity field of the specified SCODE.

member.name: Windows.SUCCEEDED
member.summary: Provides a generic test for success on any status value.
member.param: The status code. This value can be an HRESULT or an SCODE. A non-negative number indicates success.
